productShortDesc: Brand new 85CG in popular mahogany finish.
productLongDesc: Brand new 85CG in popular mahogany finish. Hand selected from Lyon & Healy's Chicago showroom and factory.  Includes an ergonomic tuning key, dust cover and 5-year factory warranty. $22,500.00 (plus any applicable tax). A 10% fully refundable deposit will reserve this harp for your first right of refusal. Call or email for reservations and more details. stephen@phoenixharpcenter.com.
Salvi 'Arianna' built 2015. Lightly played, in pristine condition.  $29,900.00 (plus tax). Shipping is available, contact us for quote.

productShortDesc: Dusty Strings 'FH36S' 36-string lever harp in walnut with Gut strings.
productLongDesc: Dusty Strings 'FH36S' 36-string lever harp in walnut with Gut strings. Includes Camac Levers, staved body, custom tuning wrench, deluxe carrying case and 2-year warranty.SOLD

productShortDesc: Dusty Strings 'Ravenna' 34 with full Loveland levers, light tension strings and custom transport case.
productLongDesc: Dusty Strings 'Ravenna' 34 with full Loveland levers, light tension strings and custom transport case. Includes tuning key and 2-year warranty.$2,545.00 (plus applicable tax)
Lyon & Healy 'Ogden' 34-string lever. Full Performance levers, concert tension strings. Includes ergonomic tuning key, carrying case and 2-year warranty. $3,200.00 (plus applicable tax)

productShortDesc: Noteworthy 'County Kerry' lap harp in cherry veneer includes full levers, tuning wrench, shoulder strap and soft carrying case.
productLongDesc: Noteworthy 'County Kerry' lap harp in cherry veneer includes full levers, tuning wrench, shoulder strap and soft carrying case. Only 8 pounds! 24-string harp is excellent for therapy. SOLD

productShortDesc: Built in 2012, this beautiful Celtic II has been carefully cared for its entire life.
productLongDesc: Built in 2012, this beautiful Celtic II has been carefully cared for its entire life.  Package includes: 1. Full Camac Levers on all 34 strings2. Laser-engraved 'Sirius' on pillar and soundboard3. On-board installed pick-up4. Deluxe travel cover with wheels5. Deluxe engraved tuning wrench6. Extra misc. strings Purchase price $4,800.00 Plus tax, if applicable.To schedule an appointment, contact stephen@phoenixharpcenter.com.

productShortDesc: Built originally in 1992 with a new soundboard in 2019.
productLongDesc: Built originally in 1992 with a new soundboard in 2019.Package includes: 1. Ergonomic tuning key2. Custom Cavallavo travel cover3. Seiko chromatic tuner and Wittner metronome4. Full sharpening levers on all 34 strings 5. Toolkit box with misc. strings

Very good condition, like new, with beautiful wood grain. Built in 2015, last restrung and regulated in December of 2019. Includes a case and tuning key....

productLongDesc: This harp is a great option for those seeking a concert tension lever harp. With a full 40 strings and a sturdy structure, this Swanson harp is the ideal instrument for students. It has beautiful gold detailing towards the crown of the harp, as well. Call us about it with any questions!

This lovely FH36S has all of the warmth and tone you’ve come to expect from Dusty String’s top model. This harp has a Dusty Strings pickup already installed, perfect for all of your amplification needs! Stop by the Virginia showroom to try this harp out for yourself.

The Dusty Strings FH36S line is known for having a robust and resonant sound, and this lovely harp is no exception. It is in excellent condition and comes with a padded carry bag. Call the Virginia showroom about this beautiful harp before it’s gone!
Are you ready to rock out? This electric-acoustic Egan is in like-new condition and has a lovely clear and bright tone. Come to our Virginia showroom to try it out for yourself.

This curved-body harp is shaped so you don’t have to lean the harp back on your shoulder for playing. It is made from rare Kuari wood from New Zealand and has a charming, hand-painted frog on the top of the column. Call the Virginia Showroom today with any questions!

This Dusty Strings Allegro 26 just arrived in our New Jersey showroom. Built from solid Sapele wood, this 26 string harp has a beautiful tone. It is in good condition structurally, though there are a few aesthetic blemishes. At $1,200, it’s a great opportunity to get a solid wood harp without breaking the bank. Call our New Jersey showroom to try it out today!

The Camac Korrigan is a great option for someone looking for a lever harp with a pedal harp sound. It is strung with concert tension gut strings and Galli lever wires. This one has been kept in excellent condition and has a fresh set of strings on it. Come on down to the New Jersey showroom to try it out today!

Believe it or not, this Thormahlen Ceili sounds just as beautiful as it looks. The harp’s voice is crystal clear, bright, and very full. This Ceili was built in 2017 and is in excellent, like-new condition. The harp also comes with built-in embellishments including a vine inlay on the pillar and a Dusty Strings pickup system installed. Come fall in love with this harp at the Virginia showroom!

This FH36S has a deep and robust tone and is in excellent condition both structurally and cosmetically. If you’ve always dreamed of having your own FH36S but didn’t want to break that bank, now is your chance! Save over $1,000 off of new. Call the Virginia showroom about it today!
							This model is available for rent. 
							Learn more about our Rental Program.

This Style 23 lives up to its expectations: birds-eye maple, intricately carved column, and a full, even sound that soars above the orchestra to make its voice heard. For 30 years it has been lovingly played by a professional harpist. The neck and soundboard are in excellent shape, and the action does show some wear due to its busy work schedule. In short, this harp has led a life as the star of the stage and is waiting for the curtain to rise with you at its side for Act 2. Come try this gem today at our New Jersey showroom!

It is not often we come upon such a well preserved treasure like this beautiful gold semi grand pedal harp.  This instrument features a full, warm, rich tone that would be at home on the concert stage or at home for your own enjoyment.   Play it today.  We know you will love it!

This Troubadour VI has a lovely deep tone and a beautiful mahogany finish. The harp was manufactured in 2016 and has only had one previous owner. If you’re a harp student looking for the perfect concert tension harp for your lessons or a professional looking for a more portable harp with a warmer sound, look no further!

At just 12 pounds, this Heartland Delight packs a big volume punch for such a lightweight harp. It boasts a clean, even sound from treble through bass which can be further augmented by its pre-installed Fishman pickup. This sleek, classic black harp is adorned with tarnish-resistant, gold-plated hardware, Truitt levers, and a sparkling golden racing stripe. Cherished by its previous owner for 10 years, this harp is waiting to embark on a new journey. Come visit the New Jersey showroom today to try it out!

This Thormahlen Swan shines with a rippling, quilted maple grain as shimmering as the waters on which the regal swan glides. In addition to its beauty, this harp has a delightful, full tone from top to bottom. The strings are very responsive allowing for the performer to achieve the desired tone with great ease. This Swan is currently strung in nylon with newly restrung wires, Loveland levers, and a pre-installed pickup which can come in handy for those gigs when extra amplification is required. An added bonus: This harp is available through our Rent-to-Own program. Come visit the New Jersey showroom today to see for yourself what a dream this instrument is to play! 
							This model is available for rent. 
							Learn more about our Rental Program.

This one owner, professional Concert Grand pedal harp comes to us by way of a harpist who is retiring.  This harp features a warm bass and a crystallic treble.  This instrument comes with a transport cover set making it an excellent value.  This harp would be at home in your studio or on the concert stage.  Come and audition it today!  Regulation pending.

This concert grand pedal harp has a very attractive price. Other than some noise in the action, this Venus Premier 46 is in good structural condition and is ready to go on all of your harping adventures. Call the Virginia Showroom to find out more!

This beautiful walnut style 30 just came into our showroom. This harp is 5 years old, has only had one owner, and is in excellent condition. It was just re-strung and is due for a regulation. This one won’t last long, so call our New Jersey showroom to make an appointment to try it out while it’s still here.

This classic instrument still has some years of service left in it.  Take advantage its large, full voice and sparkling top.  This would be a good harp for an up and coming student or as a second harp for a pro.  Carl Swanson put a new neck on this harp in 2000 giving you one less thing to worry about.  Come and try it out.  You will love the way it sounds!  Regulation pending.

For a pedal harp under 10k, this Venus Traditional is a great deal. At 19 years old, it is still in excellent structural condition, though it does have several aesthetic blemishes. This would be a sturdy warhorse for a gigging professional, or it would be an excellent first pedal harp for a student. Stop by our New Jersey showroom to try it out today!

This Camac Clio S has only had one owner, who kept it in excellent condition. The Clio’s smaller frame and straight soundboard make one of the easiest harps to travel with. This one has a fresh set of strings and is ready to find a new home. Call our New Jersey showroom today to set up a time to try it out!

This charming Troubadour V has a rich and robust voice that is even throughout. Troubadour harps are one of the most popular harps for their warm tones and concert tension. Now is your chance to own one of these fabulous harps at a fraction of the cost of a new one! Call the Virginia showroom for more information.

The Aberdeen Meadows is a stunning harp that boasts a clear and responsive tone. The soundboard has a hand-painted and carved walnut veneer of spring branches, a chrysalis, and a butterfly. It also comes with upgraded Truitt levers! Kept in excellent condition, the harp is less than two years old and comes with a padded carry bag, tuning key, and spare string set. Blossom into the harpist you aspire to be with this beautiful harp!

Take a look at this classic, semi grand, golden beauty!  The harp just received a new neck at rerivet at Lyon & Healy in November 2019 and is now ready to go to work with you at your fanciest performance venues.  This harp spent its life in New York City and has been played in recital at Carnegie Hall and features a warm sound with a clean attack.  Come and see if this is the perfect gold harp for you!

This charming Salvi Juno is the perfect size for all of your harping adventures! Strung with silkgut strings, it has a bright and clear voice in a small package. This harp would be perfect for a beginning harp student or someone looking to have a portable harp for harp therapy. Call the Virginia Showroom about it today!

Here’s a rare find! This Camac Ulysses is in excellent condition and ready to find a new home. The carbon fiber body makes this harp a very light 18 lbs, while the solid spruce soundboard provides a rich, traditional harp sound. It also has an installed Ischell pickup system. Come into our New Jersey showroom to try it out while it lasts!

This Salvi Daphne 47 EX is a pleasure to play! Enjoy its sweet, clear treble and then dive into a rich, full bass. Pedals smoothly glide into place. Harmonics are effortless to produce and resound like a carillon. It is in excellent condition with new strings and a pending regulation. If you are looking for a pedal harp that has it all, this one needs to be on your short list. Come visit our New Jersey showroom today!

This Swanson La Scuola has an understated elegance and a full and clear tone. The harp is in great structural condition with quiet action and a flat soundboard. If you’re in the market for a concert grand harp on a budget, look no further than this beauty. Come to the Virginia Showroom to try it out for yourself!

This Salvi Livia is just what a budding harpist needs with its solid construction, even tone, and newly-strung concert tension strings. It has already spent several years in the loving care of a young harpist and can’t wait to meet its new owner! Come try this sweet harp at our New Jersey showroom today!

This beautiful style 23 gold has a clear and resonant voice with lots of volume, warmth, and depth. It is everything you would expect from a style 23! Built in the 1940s, it had a rerivet in the 1980s and and a new soundboard in 1992. Call the Virginia showroom with any questions!

The perfect hybrid harp is waiting for you! This harp combines a carbon fiber body to make it exceptionally light with a traditional spruce soundboard to give the harp a depth of tone. Built in 2019, the harp is in like-new condition. Come fall in love with this beauty at the Virginia showroom!

We don’t see these very often! This cherry wood Heartland Sylvan just came into the showroom. This one features a birdseye maple soundboard with a celtic soundboard decoration and a full set of Truitt levers. Come visit our New Jersey showroom to see this unique beauty while it’s still here!

The ever-popular Troubadour VI has gained a sparkling reputation in the harp world for having a rich and dark tone and a large range of 36 strings. This Troubadour VI just came into our Virginia showroom and is looking for a new home. Come try it out before it’s gone!
							This model is available for rent. 
							Learn more about our Rental Program.

This like new celtic tension lever is less than one year old.  This instrument features a Sylphe soundboard decoration and a bright, full, responsive tone.  Learn your tunes with this beauty in your living room.  Call about it today!
							This model is available for rent. 
							Learn more about our Rental Program.

This terrific semi grand pedal harp features a robust, earthy tone with plenty of volume.   This harp had a restring and regulation in 2015 and has not been played since. This instrument could be your studio workhorse, outdoor gig harp, or a great instrument for a student.  This harp was rebuilt at Bell Harp Tech in 2005 and is ready for many more years of good service.  Our play tester said, “This feels like home.”  Take it to your home.  Call today!

Looking for a Lyon & Healy concert grand harp on a budget? This Style 23 has a rich and dark tone that can fill the room. This harp has served its previous owner well and still has a lot to offer for all of your harping adventures. Be sure to come and see this harp before it’s gone!

This Ravenna 34 has a beautiful, full sound with sparkling overtones. It would make an ideal entry-level harp or an excellent second harp for those gigs when a smaller harp is just what you need. Come visit our New Jersey showroom today!

Semi grand pedal harps are a little hard to find these days and we have a nice one for you!  This clean harp has a huge sound and a clear, resonant upper register.  We can’t keep our hands off of it!  You should come to the store and put your hands on it.  We know you will want to take this instrument home with you!
